article.aria-label: Have you seen the Millburn Coloring Book?

h3.a: Have you seen the Millburn Coloring Book?

div.div:
Our Millburn High School AP Art Students have created a Millburn Township Coloring Book, with pictures of all of your favorite Millburn landmarks, businesses and special places.
Download the coloring book, color the drawings and share them on social media using the hashtag #ColorMillburn.

article.aria-label: MHS Phys Ed Teachers Create a #MillburnStrong PSA

h3.a: MHS Phys Ed Teachers Create a #MillburnStrong PSA

div.div: Stay Safe, Stay at Home & Stay Active!

Click on the button in the center of the page to go to our Distance Learning Hub. Or click on Distance Learning tab. These pages and resources are being updated as new information and programs become available. If you have questions/suggestions please email us at webmaster@millburn.org. Thank you. Stay well.

article.aria-label: 2020-2021 Registration for New Students Taking Place Online

h3.a: 2020-2021 Registration for New Students Taking Place Online

div.div: **ALERT: With schools closed until further notice, all registrations and related communication is being done online. Follow the instructions here to complete your online registration, and then please email the registrar at registrar@millburn.org. The registrar will guide you in options for submitting your documentation electronically, provide you with an outline of next steps and answer any of your questions.
Current information about the responses by the school, district, town and state, and resources for parents and students can be found on the website.
